trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Sekelok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
text: Sekelok rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: As a bonus action, Sekelok can regain 20 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Sekelok makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

action.name: Greatsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if Sekelok has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Sekelok has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
